Text: Onugo-mi chechi te̩ anede O̩jo̩ kate;
Ma nyʼojuju du n, chai alu ku ma ale ku ma kʼo̩ e̩che̩ anʼane̩ bʼudago-wñ te̩.
Onugo-mi, echi e̩ chi anede O̩jo̩ kate,
Ame̩ amone̩, me̩ ke̩do̩nʼo e̩gba du;
Ochochi amone̩ chʼafu ki adufu lef iñmo̩,
E̩ ki ke̩do̩no e̩wñ afuma eche n,
O Ondu, ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ño̩ chʼe-we̩ ge̩.
